attributes.action: create a Once-a-year motoring payment that covers your MOT, Road Tax and Insurance, depending on what level you require.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Motorists should be able to pay one monthly or yearly payment that covers the cost of an annual MOT, Vehicle license tax and your insurance premium.
This could be offered out as part of your insurance premium from your insurance company or the government could introduce a partnership programme whereby insurance companies work together.
